attributes.action: Allow me to earn more as well as getting carers allowance for looking after my son
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a 24 year old son I want to work while he has carers(Mondayto Friday 10 hours a day). To get me out of the house and use my experience.I can only take a low paid part time job or lose my carers allowance I care for my son the other 118 hours a week.
